## utils.Coordinate.sum() method

Returns the sum of two coordinates as a new Coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static sum(a: Coordinate | SVGPoint, b: Coordinate | SVGPoint): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) \| SVGPoint | An x/y coordinate. |
|  b | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) \| SVGPoint | An x/y coordinate. |

**Returns:**

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md)

A Coordinate representing the sum of the two coordinates.
